TopicTitle: My Space Program's First Mining Success

Articles.Content: This is my new space program's first mining success!

I can't believe how my save is almost 23 kerbal years old and still haven't mined even a unit of Khetane...

KEEP GOING! you'll get better and better and probably send crew to Jool and back whit Khetane refuelling systems!

I can't believe how my save is almost 23 kerbal years old and still haven't mined even a unit of Khetane...

KEEP GOING! you'll get better and better and probably send crew to Jool and back whit Khetane refuelling systems!

Thanks, I like to call it operation crystal clear!
I only play career - haven't even looked at sandbox. I keep hearing about Khetane - is this part of the actual game at some point or is this a mod?
This is a mod. If you search for "KSP Kethane" (without the "" thingies of course.) You should find the forum thread for it.
